events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department based on your experience and skills listed in your resume.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the hiring process and provide assistance as needed.
You have successfully passed the initial screening based on your qualifications and we would like to schedule a technical interview soon.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. Please confirm your attendance.
The technical interview was completed successfully; the panel was impressed with your coding skills and problem-solving approach.
We have scheduled an HR interview for you on May 15th to discuss company culture and benefits in detail.
Your HR interview went very well, and the team is enthusiastic about the possibility of you joining the engineering department.
An official offer has been proposed with a competitive salary package and benefits for your review and consideration.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the offer and appreciate your enthusiasm for joining our engineering team.
Congratulations on accepting the offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard and will start the onboarding process shortly.
Your onboarding has officially started. We have sent you all necessary documentation and introduced you to the engineering team's communication channels.
The hiring process is now closed with your successful integration into the team. We look forward to your contributions as a software engineer.
